name: Pigeon Strike
description:
We all have our bad days. You're late, your tire's flat, and you have a coffee spill on your new shirt. In Pigеon Strike you get to be the master troublemaker that delivers even more bad luck.


This fun casual game is offering you the chance to relax and get some lazy revenge while you test your reflexes and expand your poop reign. Pigeon Strike is full of surprises - players can collect awesome boosters that can be found all over the map and will give you a bunch of new cool abilities!



Who doesn't like customizations? You also get the chance to change the appearance of your character slightly or drastically! Skins come in many shapes and forms - collect them all and enhance your gameplay by adding extra detail to your poopy friend!

Birds fly long distances and some even migrate to different places. Players, along with their feathered friends, discover three different maps and everything they have to offer. Prizes and benefits change with every map, so play along to be part of this awesome adventure!



Stay tuned for more maps in the future!

Key Features:

  • Classic Navigation through the map (W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys)
  • Dodge or Slash your way through various obstacles
  • Fly through 3 different maps
  • Evolve with 5 boosters (poop storm, shrapnel, immune, slo-mo, double score) and make a total mess around you
  • Escape or distract nasty seagulls
  • Chase totally unsuspecting people
  • 12 awesome skins and appearances brought to life with our hand-crafted 2D art
  • Ridiculously fun, satisfying, and addicting to play!
